name: Atlas
description: Atlas (Ἄτλας) is one of the mighty Titans that once had dominion over the world. After their fall from grace, Atlas would cooperate with the goddess Persephone in order to destroy the world, but was defeated by Kratos. Defeated and contained, Atlas was forced to carry the world on his shoulders, as he would forever remain at the top of the Pillar of the World. He serves as the secondary antagonist in God of War: Chains of Olympus and as an ally in God of War II.
